Header: Hotdog-munching Russian fans become social media stars of World Cup
Content: It was the 11th minute of extra time in Russia’s tense victory over Spain when the unlikely stars of the show emerged: three Russia fans clad in traditional female headgear shown on national TV snacking on hot dogs in the stands. The spectacle of the unmistakably Russian trio who were picked out by television cameras eating serenely as the country’s nerves frayed during the match against Spain propelled them to national fame. The fans two men and a woman have become a viral Internet sensation in Russia and tributes have also spread offline thanks to artists like Aleks Melentyev who says he was inspired by the quintessentially Russian fans.
